original_text: or in enmity struck him down with his hand, so that he died, then he who struck the blow shall be put to death. He is a murderer. The avenger of blood shall put the murderer to death when he meets him.
korean_text: 악의를 가지고 손으로 쳐죽이면 그 친 자는 반드시 죽일 것이니 이는 살인하였음이라 피를 보복하는 자는 살인자를 만나면 죽일 것이니라

sentences.original_text: or in enmity struck him down with his hand
then he who struck the blow shall be put to death
sentences.korean_translation: 그러면 친 자는 반드시 죽임을 당해야 합니다

sentences.original_text: The avenger of blood shall put the murderer to death
sentences.korean_translation: 피의 보수자는 그 살인자를 죽일 것입니다
